name: Chosen (brokegang, pdfirefly, Eazy)
description:
Chosen is a rouge-like game where you fight through waves of enemies unlocking new abilities and forms by choosing from the Light or Dark path.

Each side offers unique abilities and effects so choose wisely which side you will take before facing off the elusive boss...

CONTROLS ------------------------------------------

  • WASD - to move 
  • Left-CLICK - to shoot 
  • Q, E, L-SHIFT, L-CTRL - to use abilities (when unlocked)

ABILITIES ---------------------------------------------

  1. Light Form Passive -  Increased attack speed with less damage.
  2. Dark Form Passive -  Increased damage with less attack speed.
  • Light Dash (Shift key) - let's you dash a short distance, level 1 ability.
  • Light Fire Puddle (Q key) - throw's a molotov-like puddle that burns enemies, level 2 ability.
  • Dark Stun (Left-Control Key) - stuns all enemies in a radius around you, level 1 ability.
  • Dark Bomb (E key) - throw's a bomb that explods after a set time, level 2 ability.
